text: Welcome to the community <@UG1TJ6RQQ> - How are you enjoying HubSpot CMS so far?
Welcome <@UG25DLETZ> - great to have you a part of our community! Bawstahn? haha awesome. :slightly_smiling_face: You'll have to stop by sometime to check out HubSpot HQ

HI <@UF7FVNA65> - welcome to the community! ... this slack is primarily coders working with our CMS and APIs.

Your question would be great for the CRM community which you can find here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Sales-Hub/ct-p/sales> (I'd search in the forum to see if someone else already asked/answered this question)

Also - if you have a paid HubSpot account, you'll get access to support. You can give the support team a call and they'd be happy to help walk you through how to do this.

Lastly, I found a number of knowledge articles that may help: <https://www.google.com/search?q=site%3AHubSpot.com+lead+rotation&oq=site%3AHubSpot.com+lead+rotation&aqs=chrome..69i57j69i58.5002j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8>
Hi, thanks for your revert. I did call the support and got helped :slightly_smiling_face:
Awesome! Glad to hear you got it sorted. :raised_hands:
